components.description:
A supernatural being, which is generally shown to be imprisoned within a bottle or lamp. May be capable of granting wishes when summoned. Variations exist for a female genie or male genie.

Several vendors' design for this emoji is highly reminiscent of The Genie character from Disney's Aladdin films.
components.title: Genie

components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description: A circle shown with a crossed vertical line beneath it, used as a representation for women. Often used on International Women's Day.
components.title: Female Sign

description: A supernatural female being, which is generally shown to be imprisoned within a bottle or lamp. May be capable of granting wishes when summoned.
title: Woman Genie
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the 'woman genie' emoji embodies a mystical and powerful presence. She is depicted with flowing, ethereal robes that utilize Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, giving her a sense of otherworldly grace. Her form is enhanced by subtle 3D shading and realistic lighting, creating an aura of magic and wonder. This emoji, with her enrapturing gaze, is perfect for conveying wishes, dreams, or a touch of enchantment in your digital communications on Apple devices.
